articles.description: Vertex Live on Arbitrum Vertex is now live on Arbitrum, enabling cross-margin trading for spot and derivatives. Vertex combines an off-chain order book layered on top of an on-chain automated market maker on a decentralized, self-custodial exchange.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Vertex Live on Arbitrum, Avalanche Ethereum Native USDC Bridging, Cross-chain Liquid Staking, and more...

articles.description: Bancor Carbon Live Bancor launches the Carbon AMM. Carbon offers irreversible Range Orders and automated Recurring Strategies and is MEV-resistant. Iron Fish Mainnet Iron Fish, a privacy-focused L1, launches mainnet. For now, users are able to host a node, start mining, mint/burn custom assets, or transfer assets on Iron Fish.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Bancor Carbon Live, Iron Fish Mainnet, Free MEV Protection, and more...

articles.description: Uniswap Wallet Live on App Store Uniswap Wallet iOS app passed the App Store review and is now available for download. The wallet supports networks including Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, and Optimism, and charges 2.55% in fees for crypto purchases. Ondo MMFs Stablecoin
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Uniswap Wallet Live on App Store, Ondo MMFs Stablecoin, Trade to Earn, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: Yearn $10m Exploit Yearn is exploited and lost ~$10m. The attacker conducted a flash loan attack through Aave and exploited the Yearn USDT token (yUSDT), then acquired a large number of stables on Curve pool. The team tweets that V1 and V2 vaults are unaffected, and is investigating the contract issue.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn $10m Exploit, Ethereum Shanghai Live, Farming on zkSync Era, and More...

articles.description: Euler Redemption Live Euler has revised the redemption plan for the exploit. Affected users can now check their redemption numbers at https://redemptions.euler.finance/ Shanghai Mainnet Coming The Ethereum Shanghai upgrade (Shapella) will be activated at block 6209536 (~4/12/2023, 10:27:35 PM UTC).
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Euler Redemption Live, Shanghai Mainnet Coming, Intro to ZK-Rollup L2, and More...

articles.title: Today in DeFi - Solend V2 Live, Avocado on Polygon zkEVM, LSD Degen Farm, and More...
